sourcesContent:
import Prevstate from './state'
import * as types from './action-type'


export default (state = Prevstate, { type, payload }) => {
    let newData = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(state))
    console.log(state,newData)
    switch (type) {
        case types.ADD_LIST:
            newData.list.unshift(payload)
            return newData
        case types.CHANGE_LIST_NUM:
            return newData.num = payload
        case types.CHANGE_BOOL:
            console.log('chakua',newData)
            newData[payload].bool=false
            return newData

        default:
            return state
    }
}
